tags: this is why voldemort has no nose
body:
MAJOR HEADCANON

So, we know that Voldemort couldn’t love because he was conceived under the effects of a love potion.

He never wanted anything to do with love, especially when he transformed from Tom Riddle to Voldemort.

What if he got rid of his nose so that he couldn’t smell Amortentia?

Because imagine Tom Riddle desperately trying to detach himself from his past. Being reminded of what he loved would totally destroy that.

title: The Impostors
body:
This is a story I’m writing for Color me Perfect’s Harry Potter fanfic contest. It’s a short story of Harry, Ron and Hermionies’ Fifth Year at Hogwarts. I won’t spill any of the juice. Just read and enjoy!

‘The Perfect Plan’

Ron and Harry were in the Gryffindor common room, both looking rather furious.“He’s mental, Greg is”, Ron told Harry, his face red in anger,“he really is!”“I’ll tell you who’s mental!”, Harry replied,…

Read more…

summary: one of the v. important things the movies missed about ron is just like, how down to fight he was at all times. like not even...
body:
one of the v. important things the movies missed about ron is just like, how down to fight he was at all times. like not even duel just he was always ready to physically beat the shit out of people who insulted his family or friends and WOULD if no one stopped him.

there are so many points in the books where its just casually dropped in ‘and so Harry and/or Hermione had to physically restrain Ron’ usually from Malfoy but if Harry or Hermione weren’t paying attention it became ‘and so Ron punched Malfoy in the face’. 

Like, Ron cursing Malfoy for calling Hermione Mudblood wasnt just a one off thing like every time he did that in the future when Ron was there it was like ‘ron had to be stopped from ending Malfoy’s life’ just thrown in there. Same for any other severe insults.

My absolute favorite instance of this is in the first book when they’re just watching a Quidditch game and Malfoy just starts bothering Ron and Hermione during it and is finally like ‘man its pretty funny how the Gryffindor quidditch team is recruited based on pity like y’know Potter has no parents, Weasley’s brothers have no money they should include Longbottom for having no brains” and Ron just flings himself at Malfoy and starts punching him and rolling around under the bleachers and Neville is like “uh shit i guess i better fight CRABBE AND GOYLE BOTH AT ONCE so they don’t go after him” (very underrated moment of courage from Neville he knew he had no chance but he just went for it honestly almost more impressive than confronting Voldemort in book 7)

and they’re just fighting for like twenty minutes and Hermione doesn’t even notice because she was so focused on tuning Malfoy out and watching the game and when its over she looks around like “where’d ron go” and then later its mentioned “Harry sees Ron and his face is covered in blood and he’s like “GOOD JOB WINNING THE GAME HARRY I GAVE MALFOY A BLACK EYE SO WE BOTH DID GREAT THINGS TONIGHT oh btw i have detention for a week and neville’s unconcious but they say he’ll be fine”.

Ron is ride or die and will fight u for $0 y’all

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Harry: Cissy and I are best friends!

tags: harry potter and the half blood prince
harry potter and the half blood prince imagine
being friends with x would include
summary: Being close to the Golden Trio while also being close to Draco in your sixth year would include:
body:
Being close to the Golden Trio while also being close to Draco in your sixth year would include:

  • Trying to spend enough time with all of them during the summer holidays
  • Being concerned for the well being of your friends and the school when the Death Eaters go on a rampage over London
  • Knowing something was up with Draco during both the summer and during the school year
  • Being concerned about it and trying to bring it up with the Trio
  • All three of them, especially Harry, not particularly that worried as none of them liked Draco that much and thought that he could take care of himself
  • At first you thought they were right, but as your friendship with Draco slowly started to end you wanted to confront him about it
  • When you first asked him about it he was hesitant to answer. But you gave him looks that told him that he could trust you
  • When he did finally tell you, you knew you had to try and convince him to not do it, for the sake of your friend and for the sake of the school
  • When the time came to actually killing Dumbledore, something inside him clicked and he couldn’t do it. Something inside him knew you had something to do with it,
  • But also something told him that he would never forgive himself for killing someone
  • Draco was sixteen, he didn’t want the conscience of having killed the headmaster of Hogwarts laying on his soul for the rest of his life
  • But the sight of actually seeing him killed did lay on his, and Harry’s, soul for the longest time
  • When all the students where in the courtyard with Dumbledore laying dead on the floor, the Harry cake up to you and said that he should’ve realised sooner what you meant by something was up with Draco and was sorry that he didn’t
  • You knew that the two boys didn’t see eye-to-eye but hoped that, hopefully, they could be a little closer

A/N: sorry this took so long, @rhaellas. I hope I did this justice. I had started writing this like, last week or something, but the tumblr app reloaded while I was in the middle of writing it (I had either locked my phone or gone onto a different app) and I lost it so I had to restart. I also apologise for the crappy ending and not enough Trio in it

Being close to the Golden Trio while also being close to Draco in your sixth year would include:

  • Trying to spend enough time with all of them during the summer holidays
  • Being concerned for the well being of your friends and the school when the Death Eaters go on a rampage over London
  • Knowing something was up with Draco during both the summer and during the school year
  • Being concerned about it and trying to bring it up with the Trio
  • All three of them, especially Harry, not particularly that worried as none of them liked Draco that much and thought that he could take care of himself
  • At first you thought they were right, but as your friendship with Draco slowly started to end you wanted to confront him about it
  • When you first asked him about it he was hesitant to answer. But you gave him looks that told him that he could trust you
  • When he did finally tell you, you knew you had to try and convince him to not do it, for the sake of your friend and for the sake of the school
  • When the time came to actually killing Dumbledore, something inside him clicked and he couldn’t do it. Something inside him knew you had something to do with it,
  • But also something told him that he would never forgive himself for killing someone
  • Draco was sixteen, he didn’t want the conscience of having killed the headmaster of Hogwarts laying on his soul for the rest of his life
  • But the sight of actually seeing him killed did lay on his, and Harry’s, soul for the longest time
  • When all the students where in the courtyard with Dumbledore laying dead on the floor, the Harry cake up to you and said that he should’ve realised sooner what you meant by something was up with Draco and was sorry that he didn’t
  • You knew that the two boys didn’t see eye-to-eye but hoped that, hopefully, they could be a little closer

Being close to the Golden Trio while also being close to Draco in your sixth year would include:

  • Trying to spend enough time with all of them during the summer holidays
  • Being concerned for the well being of your friends and the school when the Death Eaters go on a rampage over London
  • Knowing something was up with Draco during both the summer and during the school year
  • Being concerned about it and trying to bring it up with the Trio
  • All three of them, especially Harry, not particularly that worried as none of them liked Draco that much and thought that he could take care of himself
  • At first you thought they were right, but as your friendship with Draco slowly started to end you wanted to confront him about it
  • When you first asked him about it he was hesitant to answer. But you gave him looks that told him that he could trust you
  • When he did finally tell you, you knew you had to try and convince him to not do it, for the sake of your friend and for the sake of the school
  • When the time came to actually killing Dumbledore, something inside him clicked and he couldn’t do it. Something inside him knew you had something to do with it,
  • But also something told him that he would never forgive himself for killing someone
  • Draco was sixteen, he didn’t want the conscience of having killed the headmaster of Hogwarts laying on his soul for the rest of his life
  • But the sight of actually seeing him killed did lay on his, and Harry’s, soul for the longest time
  • When all the students where in the courtyard with Dumbledore laying dead on the floor, the Harry cake up to you and said that he should’ve realised sooner what you meant by something was up with Draco and was sorry that he didn’t
  • You knew that the two boys didn’t see eye-to-eye but hoped that, hopefully, they could be a little closer

A/N: sorry this took so long, @rhaellas. I hope I did this justice. I had started writing this like, last week or something, but the tumblr app reloaded while I was in the middle of writing it (I had either locked my phone or gone onto a different app) and I lost it so I had to restart. I also apologise for the crappy ending and not enough Trio in it

blog.name: pottercrew
blog.title: Drarry, Drarry, Drarry
blog.description:
Send me a word and I'll write a Drarry drabble for it!

Instagram: missichigokurosaki

summary: Could you write a little something where Harry asks Draco to the Yule Ball? So I can die a little more inside? ❤️❤️
question: Could you write a little something where Harry asks Draco to the Yule Ball? So I can die a little more inside? ❤️❤️
answer:
Here you go :) Sorry it’s short aha

“Potter what the hell do you think you are doing?” Draco snapped as Potter grabbed his arm and pulled him towards an empty hallway. “Potter!!” 

“Just wait a second Malfoy” Potter snapped back, eyes flying everywhere around them as he pulled Draco along. Draco should have taken that as a clue to what was about to happen, as well as the unusual flush to Potter’s face. 

They came to a stop in an empty hallway and Potter dropped his arm “What’s wrong with your face?” Draco asked him. 

“What-nothing” Potter replied looking everywhere but a Draco. 

“Well then Potter, if you just dragged me here to be fucking weird-” 

“Will you go to the ball with me?” Potter rushed, finally looking at Draco. 

Draco just blinked at him. Go to the ball? With Potter? 

Potter seemed to take his silence as a rejection and stepped back “Never mind, don’t worry about it Malfoy” He went to turn around. 

“Meet me by the great hall at six before it starts” Draco said, stopping Potter in his tracks. Potter turned around. 

“What?”

Draco rolled his eyes and repeated himself slowly “Meet me by the great hall at six”

It suddenly seemed to dawn on Potter and he smiled brightly, making Draco’s mouth  go dry. Stupid Potter. 

“Okay cool”
